Install from NPM

```bash
npm install --save rumble-charts
```

Include

```javascript static
const {
  // main component
  Chart, 
  // graphs
  Bars, Cloud, Dots, Labels, Lines, Pies, RadialLines, Ticks, Title,
  // wrappers
  Layer, Animate, Transform, Handlers,
  // helpers
  DropShadow, Gradient, helpers
} = require('rumble-charts');
```
